title: 05/20/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 05/20/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
Colin pushes back against the Laker-doubters after their impressive win over the Warriors in the NBA “play in game” to secure their place in the playoffs. He argues that LeBron’s clutch 3 pointer late in the game was clearly skill, not luck. He talks about Steph Curry’s status in the Bay Area and why it could be time for him to find a new contender in the near future.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
